original_title: Τι Κάνει Ο Άνθρωπος Για Να Ζήση
overview: Leandros is a night club owner who is trying to avoid imprisonment by searching for money to pay the insurance contributions. Along with his debts, he has to withstand the pressures of his beloved for marriage.
title: Τι Κάνει Ο Άνθρωπος Για Να Ζήση
